content: legs of the next stitch continue and make sure the numbers are divisible with 4 row 1 rs picking up sts row 2 ws slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 row 3 rs slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 row 4 ws slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 place markers for the buttons row 5 6 7 use three row buttonhole technique see video on hunglish knitter youtube channel row 8 ws slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 row 9 rs slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 row 10 ws slip 1 *k2 p2* p1 row 11 rs bind off assembly sew the buttons on to left band happy knitting 5
